channel.title: Visuals on InfluxData Branding Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Visuals on InfluxData Branding Docs

item.title: Primary Typeface
item.description: Primary Typeface:Rubik Usage Rules The primary typeface is for use in all contexts outside of the logo and its variations, including web, social media, and print graphics "Thin" weight should only be used at large sizes Occasional use of all caps to delineate titling is ideal If background is not white, use white type as much as possible Avoid using colored type on colored backgrounds View on Google Fonts Glyph Rr Styles Rubik Italic 200 Light Rubik Italic 400 Regular Rubik Italic 600 Medium Rubik Italic 800 Bold Characters ​‌A​‌B​‌C​‌Ć​‌Č​‌D​‌Đ​‌E​‌F​‌G​‌H​‌I​‌J​‌K​‌L​‌M​‌N​‌O​‌P​‌Q​‌R​‌S​‌Š​‌T​‌U​‌V​‌W​‌X​‌Y​‌Z​‌Ž​‌a​‌b​‌c​‌č​‌ć​‌d​‌đ​‌e​‌f​‌g​‌h​‌i​‌j​‌k​‌l​‌m​‌n​‌o​‌p​‌q​‌r​‌s​‌š​‌t​‌u​‌v​‌w​‌x​‌y​‌z​‌ž​‌А​‌Б​‌В​‌Г​‌Ґ​‌Д​‌Ђ​‌Е​‌Ё​‌Є​‌Ж​‌З​‌Ѕ​‌И​‌І​‌Ї​‌Й​‌Ј​‌К​‌Л​‌Љ​‌М​‌НЊ​‌О​‌П​‌Р​‌С​‌Т​‌Ћ​‌У​‌Ў​‌Ф​‌Х​‌Ц​‌Ч​‌Џ​‌Ш​‌Щ​‌Ъ​‌Ы​‌Ь​‌Э​‌Ю​‌Я​‌а​‌б​‌в​‌г​‌ґ​‌д​‌ђ​‌е​‌ё​‌є​‌ж​‌з​‌ѕ​‌и​‌і​‌ї​‌й​‌ј​‌к​‌л​‌љ​‌м​‌н​‌њ​‌о​‌п​‌р​‌с​‌т​‌ћ​‌у​‌ў​‌ф​‌х​‌ц​‌ч​‌џ​‌ш​‌щ​‌ъ​‌ы​‌ь​‌э​‌ю​‌я​‌Α​‌Β​‌Γ​‌Δ​‌Ε​‌Ζ​‌Η​‌Θ​‌Ι​‌Κ​‌Λ​‌Μ​‌Ν​‌Ξ​‌Ο​‌Π​‌Ρ​‌Σ​Τ​‌Υ​‌Φ​‌Χ​‌Ψ​‌Ω​‌α​‌β​‌γ​‌δ​‌ε​‌ζ​‌η​‌θ​‌ι​‌κ​‌λ​‌μ​‌ν​‌ξ​‌ο​‌π​‌ρ​‌σ​‌τ​‌υ​‌φ​‌χ​‌ψ​‌ω​‌ά​‌Ά​‌έ​‌Έ​‌έ​‌Ή​‌ί​‌ϊ​‌ΐ​‌Ί​‌ό​‌Ό​‌ύ​‌ΰ​‌ϋ​‌Ύ​‌Ϋ​‌Ώ​‌Ă​‌Â​‌Ê​‌Ô​‌Ơ​‌Ư​‌ă​‌â​‌ê​‌ô​‌ơ​‌ư​‌1​‌2​‌3​‌4​‌5​‌6​‌7​‌8​‌9​‌0​‌‘​‌?

item.title: Secondary Typeface (Code)
item.description: Secondary Typeface (Code):Roboto Mono Usage Rules The secondary typeface (Code) is only for use in code samples Use Regular weight for light backgrounds Use Bold weight for dark backgrounds View on Google Fonts Glyph Rr Styles Roboto 400 Regular Roboto 700 Bold Characters ​‌A​‌B​‌C​‌Ć​‌Č​‌D​‌Đ​‌E​‌F​‌G​‌H​‌I​‌J​‌K​‌L​‌M​‌N​‌O​‌P​‌Q​‌R​‌S​‌Š​‌T​‌U​‌V​‌W​‌X​‌Y​‌Z​‌Ž​‌a​‌b​‌c​‌č​‌ć​‌d​‌đ​‌e​‌f​‌g​‌h​‌i​‌j​‌k​‌l​‌m​‌n​‌o​‌p​‌q​‌r​‌s​‌š​‌t​‌u​‌v​‌w​‌x​‌y​‌z​‌ž​‌А​‌Б​‌В​‌Г​‌Ґ​‌Д​‌Ђ​‌Е​‌Ё​‌Є​‌Ж​‌З​‌Ѕ​‌И​‌І​‌Ї​‌Й​‌Ј​‌К​‌Л​‌Љ​‌М​‌НЊ​‌О​‌П​‌Р​‌С​‌Т​‌Ћ​‌У​‌Ў​‌Ф​‌Х​‌Ц​‌Ч​‌Џ​‌Ш​‌Щ​‌Ъ​‌Ы​‌Ь​‌Э​‌Ю​‌Я​‌а​‌б​‌в​‌г​‌ґ​‌д​‌ђ​‌е​‌ё​‌є​‌ж​‌з​‌ѕ​‌и​‌і​‌ї​‌й​‌ј​‌к​‌л​‌љ​‌м​‌н​‌њ​‌о​‌п​‌р​‌с​‌т​‌ћ​‌у​‌ў​‌ф​‌х​‌ц​‌ч​‌џ​‌ш​‌щ​‌ъ​‌ы​‌ь​‌э​‌ю​‌я​‌Α​‌Β​‌Γ​‌Δ​‌Ε​‌Ζ​‌Η​‌Θ​‌Ι​‌Κ​‌Λ​‌Μ​‌Ν​‌Ξ​‌Ο​‌Π​‌Ρ​‌Σ​Τ​‌Υ​‌Φ​‌Χ​‌Ψ​‌Ω​‌α​‌β​‌γ​‌δ​‌ε​‌ζ​‌η​‌θ​‌ι​‌κ​‌λ​‌μ​‌ν​‌ξ​‌ο​‌π​‌ρ​‌σ​‌τ​‌υ​‌φ​‌χ​‌ψ​‌ω​‌ά​‌Ά​‌έ​‌Έ​‌έ​‌Ή​‌ί​‌ϊ​‌ΐ​‌Ί​‌ό​‌Ό​‌ύ​‌ΰ​‌ϋ​‌Ύ​‌Ϋ​‌Ώ​‌Ă​‌Â​‌Ê​‌Ô​‌Ơ​‌Ư​‌ă​‌â​‌ê​‌ô​‌ơ​‌ư​‌1​‌2​‌3​‌4​‌5​‌6​‌7​‌8​‌9​‌0​‌‘​‌?​‌’​‌“​‌!​‌”​‌(​‌%​‌)​‌[​‌#​‌]​‌{​‌@​‌}​‌/​‌&​‌​‌®​‌©​‌$​‌€​‌£​‌¥​‌¢​‌:​‌;​‌,​‌.​‌* Example Paragraph VHS messenger bag craft beer food truck. Blog tofu williamsburg echo park, viral single-origin coffee umami before they sold out crucifix portland pop-up yuccie dreamcatcher air plant.

item.title: InfluxData Brand Colors
item.description: InfluxData Brand Colors The Offical Brand Colors are intended for all use cases. It is effective for UI, marketing graphics, and everything in between. Usage Rules Do not use colors outside of these colors Never use true black #000000 Primary Colors Deep Purple P0 #13002D Pool P1 #22ADF6 White P2 #FFFFFF Secondary Colors Chartreuse S0 #D6F622 Magenta S1 #BF2FE5 Comet S2 #9394FF Nuetrals There are many nuetrals because they are the most used.

item.title: Secondary Typeface
item.description: Secondary Typeface:Roboto Sans Usage Rules The secondary typeface is for use in all contexts outside of the logo and its variations, including web, social media, and print graphics "Thin" weight should only be used at large sizes Occasional use of all caps to delineate titling is ideal If background is not white, use white type as much as possible Avoid using colored type on colored backgrounds View on Google Fonts Glyph Rr Styles Roboto 100 Thin Roboto 300 Light Roboto 400 Regular Roboto 500 Medium Roboto 700 Bold Roboto 900 Black Characters ​‌A​‌B​‌C​‌Ć​‌Č​‌D​‌Đ​‌E​‌F​‌G​‌H​‌I​‌J​‌K​‌L​‌M​‌N​‌O​‌P​‌Q​‌R​‌S​‌Š​‌T​‌U​‌V​‌W​‌X​‌Y​‌Z​‌Ž​‌a​‌b​‌c​‌č​‌ć​‌d​‌đ​‌e​‌f​‌g​‌h​‌i​‌j​‌k​‌l​‌m​‌n​‌o​‌p​‌q​‌r​‌s​‌š​‌t​‌u​‌v​‌w​‌x​‌y​‌z​‌ž​‌А​‌Б​‌В​‌Г​‌Ґ​‌Д​‌Ђ​‌Е​‌Ё​‌Є​‌Ж​‌З​‌Ѕ​‌И​‌І​‌Ї​‌Й​‌Ј​‌К​‌Л​‌Љ​‌М​‌НЊ​‌О​‌П​‌Р​‌С​‌Т​‌Ћ​‌У​‌Ў​‌Ф​‌Х​‌Ц​‌Ч​‌Џ​‌Ш​‌Щ​‌Ъ​‌Ы​‌Ь​‌Э​‌Ю​‌Я​‌а​‌б​‌в​‌г​‌ґ​‌д​‌ђ​‌е​‌ё​‌є​‌ж​‌з​‌ѕ​‌и​‌і​‌ї​‌й​‌ј​‌к​‌л​‌љ​‌м​‌н​‌њ​‌о​‌п​‌р​‌с​‌т​‌ћ​‌у​‌ў​‌ф​‌х​‌ц​‌ч​‌џ​‌ш​‌щ​‌ъ​‌ы​‌ь​‌э​‌ю​‌я​‌Α​‌Β​‌Γ​‌Δ​‌Ε​‌Ζ​‌Η​‌Θ​‌Ι​‌Κ​‌Λ​‌Μ​‌Ν​‌Ξ​‌Ο​‌Π​‌Ρ​‌Σ​Τ​‌Υ​‌Φ​‌Χ​‌Ψ​‌Ω​‌α​‌β​‌γ​‌δ​‌ε​‌ζ​‌η​‌θ​‌ι​‌κ​‌λ​‌μ​‌ν​‌ξ​‌ο​‌π​‌ρ​‌σ​‌τ​‌υ​‌φ​‌χ​‌ψ​‌ω​‌ά​‌Ά​‌έ​‌Έ​‌έ​‌Ή​‌ί​‌ϊ​‌ΐ​‌Ί​‌ό​‌Ό​‌ύ​‌ΰ​‌ϋ​‌Ύ​‌Ϋ​‌Ώ​‌Ă​‌Â​‌Ê​‌Ô​‌Ơ​‌Ư​‌ă​‌â​‌ê​‌ô​‌ơ​‌ư​‌1​‌2​‌3​‌4​‌5​‌6​‌7​‌8​‌9​‌0​‌‘​‌?

item.title: Hero Graphics
item.description: Hero Graphics Usage Rules All Hero Graphics should incorporate each of these three elements: Data + Time + Action The following options for each element are available to use in your compositions Data Data can be conceptual in the form of dimensional diagrams, or more literal representations of the various industries we serve and the types of data they generate Time A layer of time must be overlaid on top of our data layer; this can come in the form of timelines, stopwatch dials, radars, or equalizers
